p: During a median follow-up period of 17 days (IQR, 13-24), 36 (12.1 %) patients were admitted to ICU for high-flow nasal cannula or higher-level oxygen support measures to correct hypoxemia ( Table 2 ). 16 (5.4 %) patients developed respiratory failure and underwent mechanical ventilation. Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) was performed in 4 (1.3 %) patients. One female patient with age of 30 years received successful operation because of ruptured ovarian cyst.
